channel.title: Bringing back old times!
channel.description:
I was cleaning out some stuff on my computer today and found a video that I made a year ago with some friends (which I actually uploaded to YouTube), and it brings back good memories of when I used to play a lot of console video games.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0w7S7k-RT40&list=UUWFdACFNS2dbMvyOQE7XN4w[/youtube]
If you aren't quite sure what the video is about, it's basically just an activity called "trickshotting".

item.title: Bringing back old times!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Old times? That was uploaded just mid last year, that’s right when everything started to turn shit.

Technically speaking, I was in the right when using ‘old times’. I never said anything about the current state of the game, only that it brought back memories of when I did play it.

[quote=“ohokay, post:4, topic:534359”]You mean bring back the wannabe12yearoldprepubescentrunt trickshotters? noty

Sorry I hate this with a passion.[/quote]
Everyone deserves an opinion, but that is very stereotypical.

Read full topic
